response.summary:
Mechanical engineer with knowledge and skills in planning, managing, and evaluatingprojects using predictive and agile approaches based on PMI and PRINCE2. Proficient in utilizingspecialized software such as Power BI (DAX, M code), MS Project, and SAP. Experienced incontrolling and monitoring projects through the utilization of key performance indicators andforecasts presented in dynamic dashboards, integrated with numerous databases and specific ERPsystems, enabling proactive management of costs, budgets, and schedules.
An adaptable individual with a strong desire to tackle new challenges and develop additional skills.Highly committed to continuous learning, facilitating rapid adaptability to ever-changingenvironments and emerging technologies. Dedicated to responding efficiently to assigned tasksand achieving personal and group objectives. Possesses excellent analytical skills, enabling thegeneration of innovative ideas and solutions to various situations.
response.skills: English, Project Control, PMI, PRINCE2, Project Management Office (PMO), Microsoft Excel, MS Project, SAP ERP, Microsoft Power BI

profile_positions.description:
● Develop comprehensive management plans for projects, includingdefining baselines for scope, costs, and schedules. Compile and provideessential technical information as input for other managementprocesses.
● Monitor and track project progress against established milestones anddeliverables, identifying any deviations and implementing correctiveactions as necessary.
● Prepare status reports for the project portfolio, including analysis ofearned value and earned schedule. Utilize "S" curves for cost andschedule to assess project progress and performance.
● Establish and maintain effective communication channels with suppliers,vendors, contractors, and clients to ensure smooth coordination andcollaboration throughout the project lifecycle.
profile_positions.title: Project Planner

profile_positions.description:
● Strategically plan and structure the project scope to effectively addressschedules, cost estimates, and project risks. Establish monitoring andcontrol activities to ensure project objectives are met.
● Generate SAP queries and reports to provide up-to-date information onthe current status of projects and their key performance indicators.
● Analyze project data and performance metrics to identify trends, risks,and areas for improvement.
● Collaborate with work teams involved in project design and/orexecution to structure the action plans.
profile_positions.title: Project Planner

profile_positions.description:
► Reportar y alimentar los sistemas de información indicando los avances y retrasos de la planeación y/o ejecución del proyecto al área de Dirección de proyectos.
► Estructurar el instrumento para realizar el seguimiento de planes y actividades del cronograma con el propósito de garantizar el monitoreo sobre los avances y retrasos de la gestión del proyecto.
► Controlar las métricas de costos versus los indicadores planeados de los proyectos a cargo.
profile_positions.title: Profesional Control y Programación de Proyectos

profile_positions.description:
► Realizar control y seguimiento de los proyectos de alto impacto de la organización como la construcción de la nueva planta de producción y la implementación del ERP SAP, con el fin de asegurar su cumplimiento en tiempo, costo y alcance.
► Elaborar informes de estado del portafolio de proyectos; análisis del valor ganado y tiempo ganado (Curvas “S” costo y cronograma).
► Implementación de indicadores de desempeño a partir de cronogramas en MS Project e informes SAP.
► Actualizar e integrar cronogramas de los distintos proveedores de los proyectos.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de Proyectos

school.name: CEUPE - Centro Europeo de Postgrado y Empresa
